name: Diep Singleplayer
description:
Destroy opponent tanks.

Every time you destroy an opponent tank, you earn points that can be used to upgrade your tank.

Controls:
- Arrow keys or WASD: move your tank
- Left mouse button: shoot
- Right mouse button: enable/disable automatic shooting

Artificial intelligence:
The opponent tanks have a basic AI at the moment. They follow or evade the player depending on the health difference between them. I will improve the AI in future updates.

***** UPDATES *****
This game is still in development. I will soon include:
- new types of tanks
- new sounds and music
- 3 difficulty levels
- improvements in AI

Follow me to be notified of updates.

You can also send suggestions in the comments below.

Thanks for playing!
